name: Sqube Escape
storyline: The Lord of Eyes has plunged all the inhabitants of the Sqube world into darkness by shattering the white crystal, the light source of the Sqube world. You must gather the light stones, divided into 3 primary colors, to reconstruct the white crystal. While doing this, you must pass through 60 levels ranging from easy to hard, defeat bosses, and reach the finale. Each level will present new challenges and obstacles, ensuring that your journey is always exciting and varied. Finding hidden Easter eggs scattered throughout the levels will add extra fun to your gameplay.
summary: A unique action-platformer game set in the Sqube universe. Challenge yourself through 60 levels filled with obstacles and bosses. Choose from four difficulty levels and enjoy immersive graphics and sound.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Sqube Escape is coming SOON to STEAM.
